--- title: "" about: template: trestles #Or solana image-width: 20em image-shape: round image: files/avatar.jpg links: - icon: github text: Github href: https://github.com/Ecosantos # - icon: twitter # text: Twitter # href: https://twitter.com/anycommonname #- icon: linkedin # text: LinkedIn # href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/Gabriel_santos1/ #- icon: google-scholar # text: Google Scholar # href: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=bruHK0YAAAAJ&hl=en # - icon: impactstory # text: ImpactStory # href: https://impactstory.org/u/0000-0002-4622-1146 #- icon: orcid # text: ORCID # href: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4622-1146 comments: false --- ### print (‘Hello World!’) I am a Brazilian population ecologist interested in many things, but particularly keen to explore the demographic drivers and fates of wildlife populations and how we can translate theory in better management actions for sustainable resources. I’m also an enthusiast of old school naturalists, citizen science and programming. Up to that, I’m a coffee seeker (a.k.a coffee addiction ), beer taster, and an MPB (Brazilian Popular Music) lover. Something in common? Be in touch! ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(leaflet) leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
